thread.title: Great location for NYC stay!
thread.title_full: Great location for NYC stay! - Review of Radisson Martinique on Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: anafL4073TY
title: Great location for NYC stay!
text: The hotel was a walking distance from a majority of tourist sites. Penn station is a 5 min walk. The staff was very welcoming and kind. We were able to store our bags prior to our check-in and post check-out which was great. The greeters ask for your key prior to entering hotel to ensure you are staying here which is good to ensure safety. Breakfast was amazing, wifi connection great. The room was clean and no one disturbed us. Overall, great and affordable choice to stay at while in NYC.
